intro: Barteria dewevrei, commonly known as the Cape barteria, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its fleshy, succulent leaves and produces clusters of small, yellowish flowers. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, showing adaptations to drought conditions. Barteria dewevrei is often cultivated for its ornamental value and resilience in dry climates.
